config_part.ioc_details: Co-ordinates and combines the various devices that are used in running a t-jump experiment

macro.name: P
macro.description: The PV prefix used on the IBEX server launching the IOC.

macro.name: TJMPER_IOC_ID
macro.description: The ID number of the T-Jumper to use.

macro.name: SAMPLE_TEMP_READBACK
macro.description: The controller for temperature readback from the sample.

macro.name: CALIBRATION_FOLDER
macro.description: The location of the T-Jump calibrations.
